thread.title: Vanessa Williams' live performance in "Show Boat" airs tonight on PBS
thread.title_full: Vanessa Williams' live performance in "Show Boat" airs tonight on PBS

title: Vanessa Williams' live performance in "Show Boat" airs tonight on PBS
text:
Vanessa Williams' live performance in "Show Boat" airs tonight on PBS Chappaqua's Vanessa Williams will kick off the weekend with a live performance on PBS. Post to Facebook Vanessa Williams' live performance in "Show Boat" airs tonight on PBS Chappaqua's Vanessa Williams will kick off the weekend with a live performance on PBS. Check out this story on lohud.com: http://lohud.us/1LxSzJ8 Cancel Send A link has been sent to your friend's email address. Posted! A link has been posted to your Facebook feed. Join the Conversation 7 CONNECT TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
Chappaqua's Vanessa Williams will kick off the weekend with a live performance on PBS. 
The lifelong Westchester resident will star in "Live from Lincoln Center: Kern & Hammerstein's Show Boat," airing Friday at 9 p.m. as part of the PBS Fall Arts Festival. The New York Philharmonic production will also feature Downton Abbeyâ€™s Julian Ovendon, actor Fred Willard and Tony nominees Lauren Worsham and Norm Lewis. 
Friday's performance is just one of the gigs Williams has taken on in recent months. The singer/actress also landed a recurring role on "The Good Wife," which stars Spring Valley native Julianna Margulies.
